message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I think $85 would be a fair price for the product considering its worth to me. Let me know if we can agree on this.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95. It's still a great deal for you considering the value you've placed on the product.
